H0.text: Bird is an example of a nonliving thing.

H1.text: Insect is an example of a nonliving thing.

H2.text: Dog is an example of a nonliving thing.

H3.text: Water is an example of a nonliving thing.

A4.text: Water is an inorganic compound with the chemical formula H2O.

A5.text: Water, being a polar molecule, undergoes strong intermolecular hydrogen bonding.
